description:
Tree Works subject to John Spencer Square, No. 119 TPO 1991 Front-  Limes (T1, T2, T3):-  Crown Thin 35%, remove         epicormic growth, deadwood. 

 Rear -  Limes (T4 and T5):-  Remove epicormic growth,         deadwood.         Cherry (T7):- Crown lift 3m. deadwood.         Cherry (T15) crown lift to 2.5m.         Chestnut (T9):- Crown lift 3m. deadwood.         Maple (T16):- Remove two lowest limbs (to ground)         back to trunk, deadwood.         Oak (17):- Crown lift to 3m., deadwood.         Large Sycamore (T10):- Remove epicormic growth.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
